name: GMCodeEditor
summary: A general purpose Code Editing component.
description:
GMCodeEditor is a NSTextView subclass that allows for editing source code.
                    
                    It has the folowing features, that are extracted as subspecs:
                    - syntax highlighting
                    - autocompletion
